processingCommand.script:
cd ${HOME}/eod_scripts/maintenance
source /appl/murex/config/$MX_ENVIRONMENT.env.conf
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_MX_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_MX CLASS_MAPPING_DBF
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_MX_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_MX DLV_EXT_DBF
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_MX_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_MX EVT_BOLB_DBF
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_MX_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_MX DLV_NET_DBF
